## Usage
1. Copy following into `.github/workflows/auto-readme.yml` in your repo.

```.github/workflows/auto-readme.yml
{{auto-readme.yml}}
```

2. Add `.github/README_TEMPLATE.md`. ([example](.github/README_TEMPLATE.md`))
